pr_title: Bring updates from Master to Preview

timeline.message:
release(2020-08-13): bump package versions (#895)

Co-authored-by: Azure IoT Client Build <aziotclb@microsoft.com>

feat(iot-serv): Make http connect and read timeouts configurable on twin and methods clients (#878)

In order to write tests for the proxy support, each test instance now has its own twin service client so that some can be configured to use proxies and others are not

Having the twin/method client's read/connect timeouts be configurable will help our e2e tests deal with timeouts when doing method/twin operations

refactor(e2e) adding throttling resiliency to tests, allow more registry operations in parallel (#879)

On lower tier hubs, these tests often hit either read timeouts from waiting for hub to finish an operation or they hit a throttling limit. This PR ensures that the SDK waits for an infinite amount of read time to account for this, and it also adds a test rule that makes a test re-run if it failed due to a throttling exception

This PR also moves some static registry/method/twin clients to live at a per-test-instance level to keep each test more isolated from one another
doc(pnp-helper): Fix javadoc in PnP Helper (#897)

fix(iot-dev): Fix NPE that occurs in AMQP layer if open fails due to authentication links not opening (#901)

CloseAsync() assumed that the instance varaible holding the amqp connection was initialized, but that is not always the case

refactor(vsts): Automate javadoc generation

generateJavadocs.ps1 will generate javadocs for the checked out branch (configurable to master, preview, etc as needed) then create a new branch based on the current gh-pages branch that contains the up to date javadocs. We'll still have to manually create a PR to merge that branch into gh-pages
refactor(e2e): Use GPU for android emulation

feat(prov-serv): Add APIs for getting attestation mechanism for individual and group enrollments (#677)

These new APIs allow you to retrieve the symmetric keys for enrollments using symmetric key attestation
refactor(sample): Make file upload samples use the granular APIs instead of the deprecated APIs (#909)

feat(iot-dev): Fix file upload complete notification APIs (#911)

completeFileUploadAsync does not behave asynchronously, so the name was a mistake. Deprecating that API and creating a new one without the Async suffix
fix(iot-dev): Fix possible null pointer issue in amqp layer (#915)
Add support for DPS for PnP samples (#913)
adding changes for temperature controller sample with dps integration (#920)
fix(iot-service): Fix issue where cloud to device messages with no payload would cause NPE when sent (#922)

fix(iot-dev): fix issue where edgelet hsm requests did not support http (#921)

Some edgelet uris are http requests to localhosts, so the SDK needs to support that.

issue #914

doc(iot-service): Update service client javadocs to include notes about hidden synchronization (#923)

issue #912 makes it apparent that we need to notify users of this hidden feature

chore: Remove SDK survey link from readme (#931)

we are closing the SDK survey

feat(digitaltwin): Digitaltwin(pnp) API implementation (#918)

Digitaltwin(pnp) API implementation

release(2020-10-01): bump package versions (#957)

Co-authored-by: Azure IoT Client Build <aziotclb@microsoft.com>
Update samples readme to point to master branch (#958)

refactor(samples): Refactor Pnp helper code for device samples (#960)

* refactor pnp samples

* address code review comments

* update nonnull description
add dt samples as module to service samples (#961)

feat(samples): Add Pnp Convention unit tests (#962)

* add pnp convention tests

* refactor some code

* pom changes

* pom changes

* add thermostat and temp controll as modules

* PnP unit tests + some sample module changes
Merge branch 'master' into bikamani/mergeMaster
samples dependencies
samples dependencies
Merge branch 'bikamani/mergeMaster' of https://github.com/Azure/azure-iot-sdk-java into bikamani/mergeMaster
fix dependencies on device samples

timeline.bodyText: Note: auto merge brought in wrong artifact, manually changed it for pnp samples
timeline.author: bikamani
